executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Kobe Harris pitched his handmade, all-natural personal care brand 'Kobe's Co.' on Shark Tank, seeking $300,000 for 6% equity. Despite strong sales growth and a compelling founder story, no deal was finalized as Kobe declined offers requiring 20% equity.
nextSteps: Kobe will continue growing Kobe's Co. independently, focusing on online sales and marketing expansion rather than accepting higher-equity offers from investors.
